alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Ouray, east central San Miguel and southwestern Gunnison Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgway, or 25 miles south of Montrose, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and large pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Ouray, east central San Miguel and southwestern Gunnison Counties, including the following locations... Camp Bird. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 82 and 110. Colorado 62 between mile markers 21 and 23. Colorado 145 between mile markers 67 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley
